text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa……I've completed the running portion! That's everything we planned to do today, right?
The long-awaited summer camp. Yaeno Muteki was really enthusiastic and today's training menu was finished in a flash.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Then……I'm going to go play!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Well, considering the way our time at the amusement park ended…… At this training camp, I'll be sure to forget about training!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: And, there's something I'd like to confirm as well……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……No, that was only said in passing! Once I'm sure, I'll speak with you again.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Well then, this unassuming Yaeno Muteki will go frolic amongst the waves. Now, towards a state of selflessness……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I have frolicked amongst the waves! Learning to walk while also avoiding the waves as they come in and out, this will help with race routeーー……No, this is training isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I have enjoyed playing with a beach ball! Watching the form and explosive power of your opponents, it was a golden opportunity to learn……Ha!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……This is also training, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Counter-intuitively……I tried running once again, but……! Wouldn't this……also be training!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Kuu, then as many times as it takes! I'm going to the summer festival at night! If you're free, Trainer-dono, would you accompany me!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……there's quite the sea of people here. Weaving through the crowd of people could be useful during a race……No!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Kuu, even here I'm still thinking about training……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I see, if it's target practice then it would have nothing to do with racing……most likely! Perhaps it will help me forget about training and reach a selfless state!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I appreciate it, Trainer-dono. Shopkeep-dono! I'd like to purchase one right of challenge!
(Bang!)

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Muu.
(Bang, bang!)

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: How unfortunate~! You missed with all of them, huh!? Don't get disheartened and feel free to try again!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: To think I'd miss with every shot…… I've shown you yet another unsightly display.
It was fine to fail, it was fine to just enjoy it. Whether it was playing or training, it was fine to be a little more laid-back.
choice_data_list: I know you've been doing your best.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Fufu. As I thought, you would say something like that. At the amusement park, and even here……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much, I think I'm finally prepared. Trainer-dono, could I borrow a bit of your time?
I didn't mind, but I wonder what it could be. If I were to agree here without thinking carefully――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Shopkeep-dono! I'd like another 5 rights of challenge please!
After that, the sound of toy gunfire echoed through the air for a while, but――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Uguu, how unsightly! To not be able to hit anything even now! It's just laughable……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Right, next time for sure! I've started to understand it just a bit. Like this, without putting in too much power……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Trainer-dono, how is it!? Are there any issues with my posture!?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I appreciate it! While holding the gun, stay steady. Steady……have fun and……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Press forward!
(Bang!)
――With a soft sound, the stuffed cat doll that Yaeno Muteki had been aiming at this whole time fell.

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper
text_block_list.text: Nice hit~! You nailed that prize! Congrats, missy!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Ah……! Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Trainer-dono, I did it! I've properly played this 'target practice'!
On the way back from the festival……Yaeno Muteki said she had 『Something to talk about』, so we ended up on the training camp beach.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Just now, I felt slightly like I had returned to my childhood. Using a toy gun to aim for that other toy……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Yes, very much so!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……and thanks to that, I felt fulfilled. And somehow, I realized why I was so unable to forget about training.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Because this flame in my heart, outside of competition, was something I was ashamed of.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That carrying this fiery disposition during children's squabbles, was something unsightly and had to be avoided at all costs――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Believing that I had to maintain strict discipline, keeping things hidden, and always focusing on training.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: However, you told me it was fine if I was unsightly, it was fine if I failed. And that's probably why I…… was able to forget all about training and have fun.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That this fire is not something to be afraid of. And nor……is it something to abhor.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Yes――When I'm with you……it's fine to forget about training.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Right, Trainer-dono. Right now……will you perform the 『Kata』 with me?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……For some reason, I feel like it'll be completely different from any before.
The summer festival was almost over, and with fireworks going off in the distance, Yaeno Muteki began to perform the 『Kata』.
It had a different weight behind it compared to the 『Kata』 she had been training with so far. Almost as if the flames were dancing and playing――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Aaaah――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――it was a fun break, wasn't it?
……It was a fun and refreshing performance, perfect for a summer evening.
